<#include "../support/console.html"> <@page_overview_title/> <#if app.consoleOutput??> ${app.jcr.createNode(model)} <#if !(getStringParameter("_title")??)> ${addUpdate("_title","History: "+getStringParameter("_path"))} <#assign historyOverview> <@display_console_output app.consoleOutput/> ${model.addUpdate("_overview",historyOverview)} ${app.jcr.editNode(model)} <#assign newCreatedNodePath=node.name/> ${model.setNode(node.parent)} ${app.executeCommand(model,"clear")}
<#if app.consoleOutput??> History saved at ${newCreatedNodePath}${format} <#else> Console already closed
<@console_overview/> <@page_overview_content/>
